scenario.title: Title: Open Day Information Narrative: As a prospective student I want to find out what information I will be given at the virtual open day so that I can decide whether I should attend. Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Open Day information webpage navigation
scenario.step: Given that the University Limerick homepage is displayed
When I click on "Virtual Open Day"
Then the virtual open day information webpage is displayed. Scenario 2: Open day timetable display
Given that the virtual open webpage is displayed
When I click on 'virtual open day timetable'
Then the virtual open day timetable is displayed. Scenario 3: Open day information videos
Given that the virtual open day webpage is displayed
When I click on the embedded video
Then the video will begin to play.
